Completed Projects

Below is a selection of music available to listen to on YouTube. While the vocals were mostly sourced online, all production was created by myself in FL Studio.

  • Hang On

    One of my first completed works using FL Studio, “Hang On” marks a transition in my production process as I experimented with different DAWs such as GarageBand and Ableton. I sourced an acapella online and textured my instrumental to complement the track’s airy and soothing vocal quality. This piece reflects my early exploration of mood and cohesion in arrangement, as well as my growing confidence in sound design within a new DAW environment.

    Listen Download FL File

  • Lofi Study Mix

    This piece expands on my interest in crafting immersive mood and atmosphere, focusing on the relaxed, textured lofi sound. I experimented with a variety of drum packs to achieve the right feeling and character as well as experimenting with different plugins more indepth such as reverb and EQ to shape the tone of the track. I top this off with a ambient cafe sound to bring the whole piece together in a relaxing vibe.

    Listen Download FL File

  • I'm Free

    With “I’m Free,” I moved beyond lo-fi into a more contemporary trap/hip-hop sound, exploring different instrumental sounds with the crisp trap/hip-hop hi-hats and the deep 808s, adding a more driving deep energy. This piece was an important step in diversifying my production style and learning how to adapt my workflow to different genres while maintaining a polished, cohesive mix.

    Listen Download FL File

  • Distant Glow

    With Distant Glow, I took a more minimalistic approach, drawing inspiration from artists like Gracie Abrams to focus on melodic expression. Unlike my previous tracks, this piece uses less percussion, placing greater emphasis on atmosphere and minimalism. I also experimented with AI-generated vocals for the first time, generating dry vocals and handling all the vocal processing myself—marking a shift from my previous projects, which used pre-processed wet vocal samples.

    Listen Download FL File
